MITREAttackScrapper.tactics package

Submodules

MITREAttackScrapper.tactics.enterprise module

class MITREAttackScrapper.tactics.enterprise.MITREAttackEnterpriseTactics

Bases: MITREAttackInformation

A class containing methods to parse MITRE ATT&CK Enterprise Tactics.

static get(tactic_id: str) → Dict[str, Any]

Get the details of a specific MITRE ATT&CK tactic for Enterprise.

Parameters:

tactic_id (str) – The ID of the specific MITRE ATT&CK tactic.

Returns:

A dictionary containing the details of the specified MITRE ATT&CK tactic.

Return type:

Dict[str, Any]

Raises:

  • ValueError – If the tactic ID does not exist in the MITRE ATT&CK Enterprise tactics.

  • RuntimeError – If there’s a failure in fetching data from the MITRE ATT&CK website.

Example

The structure of the returned data is as follows:

{
    "id": "TA0001",
    "name": "Tactic Name",
    "created": "Created Date",
    "last_modified": "Last Modified Date",
    "url": "https://attack.mitre.org/tactics/TA0001/",
    "description": "Tactic Description",
    "techniques": [
        {
            "id": "T1234.001",
            "name": "Technique Name",
            "url": "https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1234/001/",
            "description": "Technique Description"
        }
    ]
}
static get_list() → List[Dict[str, Any]]

Get the list of all MITRE ATT&CK tactics for Enterprise.

Returns:

A list of dictionaries containing tactic information.

Return type:

List[Dict[str, Any]]

Raises:

RuntimeError – If there’s a failure in fetching data from the MITRE ATT&CK website.

Example

The structure of the returned data is as follows:

[
    {
        "id": "TA0001",
        "name": "Tactic Name",
        "description": "Tactic Description",
        "url": "https://attack.mitre.org/tactics/TA0001/",
    },
    ...
]
